trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Стандартная конечная точка с фиксированной <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref> привязки, которая автоматически добавляет <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> поведение.

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when you are writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service that is called from an ASP.NET AJAX application.
trans-unit.target: Используйте эту конечную точку при написании [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] службы, вызываемой из приложения ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> класса с указанным <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> класса с указанным <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>и <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>
